channel.title: testing on Reusing the wheel
channel.description: Recent content in testing on Reusing the wheel

item.title: Revisiting my blog engine project
item.description: I recently went back to developing Yule - my blog engine project based, among others, on the Spring Boot framework. I made some progress in both its front end and back end, and I would like to sum it up in this note

item.title: Implementing service layer for Yule
item.description:
Since my introductory post on Yule, I’ve been doing some work on the project. I’ve implemented an automatic article publication feature as a part of service layer and I added some methods used by it to the repository layer of my project.

This post covers these changes and some problems I encountered during testing.
